pages.text: Ethylene is the fuel for our ultra-efficient Gas-Burning generator.  It is a byproduct of $(l:item/hdpe_pellet)HDPE (High-Density Polyethylene)$(/l).

It is produced by the $(l:block/pressurized_reaction_chamber)Pressurized Reaction Chamber$(/l) when turning $(l:item/bio_fuel)bio-fuel$(/l) into $(l:item/substrate)substrate$(/l), using $(l:chemicals/hydrogen)hydrogen$(/l) and water.
